text: Ezɨ kɨ atrivir dabirabibar gari, ezɨ gumazir dagh apiaghav itiba, God gumazamizibar araziba tuisɨghamin gavgavim me ganɨngi. Ezɨ kɨ gumazamizir ariaghrezibar duabar gari, da iti. Gumazamizir kaba, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesus ikia egha an akam akura egha Godɨn akam bar pamten an suira, ezɨ bizir kabanangɨn men apaniba me mɨsogha men fɨriba aghorezɨ me ariaghɨre. Egha gumazamizir kaba asɨzir atiam ko an marvir guamɨn ziam fer puvatɨgha an namba uan guaba ko uan agharibar a inizir puvatɨ. Kɨ gari, gumazamizir kaba me ua angamra ikia Krais Iesus ko atrivibar mɨn 1,000 plan azenibar ikiam.
